author: James Van Straten, AI Boost
title: Anthony Pompliano's ProCap BTC Buys $128M of Bitcoin in 2nd Straight Day of Purchases
description: ProCap BTC bought 1,208 BTC, bringing its total to 4,932, with plans to scale up to $1 billion in bitcoin.
content:
ProCap BTC, the bitcoin-native financial services firm led by entrepreneur Anthony Pompliano, said it bought 1,208 bitcoin
